general.gigTitle: webdesign wordpress website responsive and custom business website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Expert in Web Design, Wordpress, Woocommerce and Shopify
sellerCard.description:
Hey! I am a Deloar, Full-Time Fiverr Web Designer, Shopify and Wordpress Developer. I've over 4+ years of working experience in designing and developing interactive, user-friendly, and dynamic wordpress sites. 

I also have a strong knowledge of my field, am self-motivated, and focused on achieving the goals of my clients. My primary goal is to deliver high-quality services. 

If you are interested to discuss your project with me feel free to message me further. I'm 24/7 online available.

description.content:
Hey!

If you are searching proficient Web Designer & WordPress Developer to Webdesign wordpress website responsive and custom business website development? You're lucky to come to the right place.


I am offering you:

>> Moneyback Guarantee work according to your happiness.

I ACCEPT THE CUSTOM OFFER.



Feature of the Gig

  • Custom webdesign & Development website
  • Convert Figma, XD, and Sketch to WordPress
  • Clone, Copy, Duplicate and Redesign Any kind of site
  • Premium Theme and Plugin
  • Control Admin Dashboard
  • Maintainers site & Bugs Fixing, Theme, and Plugin Update Always
  • E-commerce site-building and Product Services Page
  • Optimized Webpage Speed
  • And Much More Much



WHY YOU SHOULD CHOOSE ME?

  • 100% Responsive webdesign (Mobile, Tablet, Laptop, Desktop)
  • After Delivery 1 month of support
  • Providing video Tutorial for how you can manage the site by yourself.



Extra Feature:

  • Unlimited times revision
  • High-Security
  • SEO & Speed Optimization
  • Manage site video Tutorial



So, What Are You Waiting For? Let's Build According to your Requirements a Beautiful Layout modern site.

 If there is a question or custom order, please feel free to contact me in the inbox.


Have a good day :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do i need to start the webdesign?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
1/ Introduce your project describe.
2/ If you don't have a logo. I'll make one that's simple
3/ If you have any color schemes & fonts, please provide them
4/ The names of the pages and the descriptions of the content
5/ Domain & Hosting providers access link.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting/domain name registration?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I don't provide domain and hosting, But I can suggest you buy the domain, hosting like NameCheap, Bluehost

questionsAndAnswers.question: After you finish the work, can I edit and modify the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can easily make changes to your website after I complete my work. without any programming skills just drag and drop easily editable.

questionsAndAnswers.question: The packages are confusing to me. What is the best package for me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can contact us about your requirements and we will recommend the best package for your business website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you offer unlimited revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We do, and we offer free after-sales service as well.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you build eCommerce functionality websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Definitely! To sell your products online, I can build an E-commerce online store as well as Shopify for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Make sure, can you create for me within 10hrs website??
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can create for you within 10hrs the website. It's for I need a Clear brief and your design ready like PSD, FIGMA, or any sketch file Provide me.

packageList.title: BASIC
packageList.description: Basic 1-3 Page wordpress webdesign +Admin Panel +Social icon +Contact Form +slider

packageList.title: STANDARD
packageList.description: 1-5 Pages Full responsive wordpress webdesign and development +Support +Plugins +Security

packageList.title: PREMIUM
packageList.description: 1-10 Pages Multivendor Ecommerce Marketplace website like Amazon, Aliexpress + 1-month support

reviews.comment: Amazing responsiveness and Delivery on time for the modifications on my website, was very nice working with him, and will definitely be working together again.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you, and I’m thrilled to hear you’re happy with the responsiveness and timely delivery. I look forward to collaborating with you again in the future!

reviews.comment: He truly did his best to meet my requests.
Good guy, making me a good website 😊

It was very nice working with Deloard for the second time, again very patient and understanding of my deadlines and did exactly what i needed, very responsive and quick delivery. Will definitely be working with him again.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your sweet words! It was such a joy working with you, and I’m so happy to hear you’re pleased with the quick responses and timely delivery. I can’t wait to team up with you again in the future!
